raw_comment:
I notice there is a strong increase from wealth boost, increasing 7x. The gap is pretty constant, however further in the higher percentile. legacy students have a greater admission rate.

I wonder if students and parents will recognize this problem and start to do something about it. I also wonder if affirmative action had anything to do with the outcome of the graph. It would also be interesting to see which colleges were surveyed.

This relates to me because I am approaching college admissions shortly, and gives me more information about the statistics behind the application process.

Decoding the Numbers: Does income affect admittance?
ace_sentences: There is a strong increase from a wealth boost.
The gap is further in the higher percentile.
Legacy students have a greater admission rate.
I wonder if students will recognize this problem.
I wonder if parents will recognize this problem.
I wonder if students will start to do something about this problem.

The headline is: Decoding the Numbers: Does income affect admittance?
